# Stage: Retirees

```{r}
#| label: setup

GROOT <- rprojroot::find_root(rprojroot::has_file(".git/index"))
source(fs::path(GROOT, "data-raw", "R", "setup.R"))

```


```{r}
#| eval: true

fpath <- fs::path(DIRS$work, "tests_retirement_rates.csv")
status <- readr::read_csv(fpath)

if (!all(status$passed)) {
  stop("retiree tests failure")
}

retirement_rates <- readRDS(fs::path(DIRS$work, "retirement_rates.rds"))

saveRDS(retirement_rates, fs::path(DIRS$staged, "retirement_rates.rds"))

```
